name: TLD 121 Aircraft Loader
description: Heavy-duty pallet and container loader for main deck and lower lobe aircraft loading.

name: Airport Baggage Truck
description: Electric/Diesel tug used for transporting baggage carts between sorting and aircraft.

name: Airport Catering Truck
description: High-lift vehicle designed for delivering galley supplies to a variety of aircraft heights.

name: Ground Power Unit (GPU)
description: Mobile power unit providing 400Hz electrical power to aircraft while engines are shut down.
